page.title: 17 SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: Our Parish School with two classrooms,a canteen and modest playground,is a powerhouse of activity; our 27 pupils see to that. Whether at their lessons,excursions, swimming or football,all are tackled with great enthusiasm.Full of energy, always searching for ideas, inquisitive,all natural aspirations of the young.Our children are also taught other deeper qualities of life. Qualities of the whole person.Their recent survey of the Village earned the admiration of everybody.The environment, and the encouragement they have received in their formative years, is a head start.Being a small school was a liability where beaurocracy thought we were expendable.That worry of closure is thankfully now behind us,we hope for ever.Written by a School Governor.
